title: Hot Cream Massage Gel, Fat Burning Cream, Slimming Cream with Multi- ball, Cellulite Tightening Cream, Workout Sweat Cream, Exciese Enhancer(120g)

【100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE】-- Please assure that we always stand behind our neck firming cream. Should you for any reason be unhappy with our products, we offer you 24/7 support.
description: 1.Open the switch according to the bottle mark.
2.Take out a proper amount of neck cream and heat it in the palm of your hand.
Twice a day after cleansing in the AM and/or PM.
Test a small amount on skin first before applying to larger areas.
Keep out of reach children and pets.
